mapper.select: SELECT id, user_id, category_id, title, summary, detail, icon, video_url, created_at, updated_at FROM outputs ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT id, user_id, category_id, title, summary, detail, icon, video_url, created_at, updated_at FROM outputs WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC

SELECT id, user_id, category_id, title, summary, detail, icon, video_url, created_at, updated_at FROM outputs WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND (#{keyword} IS NULL OR title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR detail LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR summary LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%')) AND (#{categoryId} IS NULL OR category_id = #{categoryId}) ORDER BY created_at DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO outputs (user_id, category_id, title, summary, detail, icon, video_url, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{categoryId}, #{title}, #{summary}, #{detail}, #{icon}, #{videoUrl}, NOW(), NOW())
mapper.update: UPDATE outputs SET title = #{title}, summary = #{summary}, detail = #{detail}, category_id = #{categoryId}, icon = #{icon}, video_url = #{videoUrl}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM outputs WHERE category_id = #{categoryId}
